SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD b JOIN MEMBER m ON b.MEMBER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO WHERE b.BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N'
AND b.BOARD_CODE = #{boardTypeNo}
AND b.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND (b.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' OR b.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%')
AND m.NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'

SELECT b.BOARD_NO as boardNo, b.BOARD_CODE as boardTypeNo, bt.BOARD_NAME as boardTypeName, b.MEMBER_NO as memberNo, m.NICKNAME as memberNickname, m.PROFILE_IMAGE as member_profile_image, b.BOARD_TITLE as boardTitle, b.BOARD_CONTENT as boardContent, b.READ_COUNT as boardViewCount, b.BOARD_CREAT_DATE as boardCreateDate, b.BOARD_UPDATE_DATE as boardUpdateDate, b.BOARD_DEL_FL as boardDeleteYn, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" c WHERE c.BOARD_NO = b.BOARD_NO AND c.COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N') as boardCommentCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "LIKE" l WHERE l.BOARD_NO = b.BOARD_NO) as boardLikeCount FROM BOARD b LEFT JOIN MEMBER m ON b.MEMBER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO JOIN BOARD_TYPE bt ON b.BOARD_CODE = bt.BOARD_CODE WHERE b.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND b.BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N'
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_BOARD_NO.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO BOARD ( BOARD_NO, BOARD_CODE, MEMBER_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, READ_COUNT, BOARD_DEL_FL, BOARD_CREAT_DATE ) VALUES ( #{boardNo}, #{boardTypeNo}, #{memberNo}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, 0, 'N', SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_TITLE = #{boardTitle}, BOARD_CONTENT = #{boardContent}, BOARD_UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM "LIKE" WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
mapper.select: SELECT c.COMMENT_NO as commentNo, c.BOARD_NO as boardNo, c.MEMBER_NO as memberNo, m.NICKNAME as memberNickname, m.PROFILE_IMAGE as member_profile_image, c.COMMENT_CONTENT as commentContent, c.PARENT_COMMENT_NO as commentParentNo, c.COMMENT_WRITE_DATE as commentCreateDate, c.COMMENT_DEL_FL as commentDeleteYn FROM "COMMENT" c LEFT JOIN MEMBER m ON c.MEMBER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO WHERE c.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND c.COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY c.PARENT_COMMENT_NO NULLS FIRST, c.COMMENT_WRITE_DATE ASC
